short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Win any word games such as scrabble, word with friends etc. by help of Wordfinder.tips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wordfinder.tips helps you win word games. You should use this if you are new to word games, or if you wish to cheat a little.

It provides following functionalities
1. Word unscrambler
2. Cheat for scrabble
3. Cheat for word with friends
4. Anagram solver
